snippet: A book explores the history of the skyline from an engineer’s perspective, and another looks at the story behind the Statue of Liberty.
abstract: Sam Roberts reviews books Good Guys, Wiseguys and Putting Up Buildings: A Life in Construction by Samuel C Florman and The Statue of Liberty: A Transatlantic Story by Edward Berenson.
lead_paragraph: A book explores the history of the skyline from an engineer’s perspective, and another looks at the story behind the Statue of Liberty.

headline.print_headline: A Different Angle on Building in New York
headline.seo: Books About the Building Trade and the Statue of Liberty
headline.main: A Different Angle on Building in New York
